nodes.text: Skyslum was the name given to the various teetering shanty town structures that filled every available space between the huge towers of Hutta Town, capital of the moon Nar Shaddaa. Like the rest of Hutta Town, the skyslums were illuminated by neon signs and holo-displays.
Skyslums were first mentioned in issue 81 of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon, a magazine released in 2016.
